org.lwjgl.glfw

Class GLFWCharCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.Closure
        • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.Closure.V
          • org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWCharCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public abstract class GLFWCharCallback
extends Closure.V
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetCharCallback(long, org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWCharCallback) method.

      static GLFWCharCallback create(GLFWCharCallback.SAM sam)
      Creates a GLFWCharCallback that delegates the callback to the specified functional interface.
      abstract void invoke(long window, int codepoint)
      Will be called when a Unicode character is input.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public abstract void invoke(long window,
                            int codepoint)
        Will be called when a Unicode character is input.
        Parameters:
        window - the window that received the event
        codepoint - the Unicode code point of the character

      • create

        public static GLFWCharCallback create(GLFWCharCallback.SAM sam)
        Creates a GLFWCharCallback that delegates the callback to the specified functional interface.
        Parameters:
        sam - the delegation target
        Returns:
        the GLFWCharCallback instance

      • set

        public GLFWCharCallback set(long window)
        See SetCharCallback.
